title: Emerald & Diamond Gold Bangles - Traditional Kadas
materials: SI Clarity). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Classic bangle design featuring alternating marquise-cut emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds. Each gemstone is meticulously bezel-set in a smooth, comfortable design. The gold has a rich, warm Hyderabadi polish.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for contemporary events and parties.
description: These bangles offer a seamless blend of traditional charm and modern elegance. The vibrant green emeralds represent prosperity and new beginnings, making them a meaningful gift or addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. Handcrafted with precision.
